text: Sungenis is a family name of Italian origin, originally spelled San Genisi, in reference to Saint Genesius of Rome. By coincidence, it is also a transliteration of the Greek word for a blood relative, συγγενής, cf. Luke 1:36, which has συγγενίς.Thayer's Greek Lexicon, Strong's Concordance entry 4773. * Robert Sungenis, Catholic apologist and author. * Pab Sungenis, creator of the webcomic The New Adventures of Queen Victoria. ==References==
title: Sungenis
